mainDescription: We have been providing professional carpet cleaning services in Tashkent for 10 years, so we know how to clean carpets properly and with quality.
whyChooseUsCard1Description: Applications are accepted 24 hours a day. If you need urgent carpet cleaning, we can arrive immediately. Nevertheless, the quality remains perfect.
whyChooseUsCard2Description: Our staff performs each process thoroughly: receiving carpets, preparing for cleaning, full cleaning, drying, and final inspection.
whyChooseUsCard3Description: Choose a time that is convenient for you, and contact us for carpet cleaning. We guarantee you effective and efficient results.
infImageTitle: 10% Discount for Areas 30 m² and Above!
infImageDescription: Take advantage of our services and get a 10% discount for areas 30 m² and above! Simplify the cleaning process today and enjoy a more comfortable life in a clean environment.
workProcessDesc1: Call or leave a request on the website (we'll clarify the details and provide the price).
workProcessDesc2: Order carpet cleaning at home or in the factory.
workProcessDesc3: We will sign a formal contract and start the work.
workProcessDesc4: We will pick up your carpets for free.
